name: Settlers of Voxia
description:
A simple submission for the Kindred Jam.

Made by a small team in a little over 3 days, a late start on the jam.

The game is about someone who just claimed a piece of land and has to start with nothing to build their own home. 

You goal is to collect a minimum quantity of resources to have enough resources to build your home. 

There are also horrible little Mublins that are roaming your land. Slay each and every one of them!

Engine:

  • Unreal Engine 4.26.1 - Blueprint and C++

Contributors:

  • SumnGameDev, AKnght, Fox and Little Tiger.

More Info:

  • All the voxel looking assets were made with MagicaVoxel.
  • Sounds and modeling where done by AKnght.
  • Level design, character design where done by Fox and Little Tiger.
  • Programming, Modeling and animations were done by SumnGameDev.

Character inspiration comes from CubeWorld!
